self.name: channels.checkUsername
self.description: Check if a username is free and can be assigned to a channel/supergroup
self.descriptionExcerpt: Check if a username is free and can be assigned to a channel/supergroup

arguments.name: channel
arguments.description: The channel/supergroup that will assigned the specified username

throws.description: You're admin of too many public channels, make some channels private to change the username of this channel
throws.name: CHANNELS_ADMIN_PUBLIC_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: The provided chat id is invalid
throws.name: CHAT_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided username is not valid
throws.name: USERNAME_INVALID
